overview:
Mr. Osterfeld joined Gatekeeper in 2001. After earning his Bachelor’s Degree in 1988 from California Polytechnic State University, San Luis Obispo, Mr. Osterfeld joined the Sales & Strategic Product Launch Group at Eastman Kodak, where he served until 1993.

From 1993 through 1997, Mr. Osterfeld acted as the Vice President of Strategic Planning and Development for Belgravia Capital Corporation, a commercial mortgage banking company. Following his tenure at Belgravia, Mr. Osterfeld worked for two years at Finova Realty Capital, a financial services company. In 1999, Mr. Osterfeld acted as President of Treatwells, a developer and manufacturer of equestrian nutritional products.

As Vice President of Sales and Marketing, Brett Osterfeld is responsible for directing North American Sales efforts and implementing global marketing strategy.

relationships.title: Vice President of Sales and Marketing
